sn35.156:0.3: 156. The Interior and the End of Relishing
sn35.156:1.1: “Mendicants, the eye really is impermanent. A mendicant sees that it is impermanent: that’s their right view.
sn35.156:1.3: When relishing ends, greed ends. When greed ends, relishing ends.
sn35.156:1.5: When relishing and greed end, the mind is said to be well freed.
sn35.156:1.11: mind really is impermanent. A mendicant sees that it is impermanent: that’s their right view.
sn35.156:1.13: When relishing ends, greed ends. When greed ends, relishing ends.
sn35.156:1.15: When relishing and greed end, the mind is said to be well freed.”
